synopsis.text:
Protectors of a Tiny World: Eri and Yuko, two ordinary high school girls, find themselves in an extraordinary situation when they are mysteriously transported to a world inhabited by diminutive people. The tiny inhabitants believe the girls to be powerful guardians destined to protect their world from impending doom.

Despite their insistence that they possess no magical abilities or transformation powers, the girls are thrust into a whirlwind of expectations and political machinations. As factions vie for control, each seeks to claim the girls as their own, hoping their alleged powers will sway the balance of power.

With war looming and the weight of an entire world on their shoulders, Eri and Yuko must navigate this strange new land, find a way back home, and, just maybe, save a world that believes in them more than they believe in themselves. Will they rise to the challenge or crumble under the pressure? Only time will tell in this thrilling adventure of courage, friendship, and self-discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
